snippet: The New York Fire Department is conducting a series of controlled burns, working with a team of scientists to study firefighting techniques adapted to homes filled with modern materials.
abstract: New York Fire Department is conducting a series of controlled burns, working with a team of scientists to study firefighting techniques adapted to homes filled with modern materials.
lead_paragraph: The New York Fire Department is conducting a series of controlled burns, working with a team of scientists to study firefighting techniques adapted to homes filled with modern materials.

headline.seo: Governors Island Buildings Burn in Fire Department Experiments
headline.main: Firefighters Set Buildings Ablaze, to Determine How to Extinguish Them Better
